translation.registration.details.heading: Fill in your details
translation.avatar.pick.heading: Choose your avatar
translation.steam.public.account.information: Make sure that your steam account privacy is set to 'Public'. This is required to allow us collect your match statistics and use it during point calculation process.
translation.premium.banner.description: Learn how to get more points and level up with the best players of the month. It's all in your hands
